org.dellroad.stuff.xml

Class IndentXMLEventWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dellroad.stuff.xml.IndentXMLEventWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    XMLEventConsumer, XMLEventWriter

    public class IndentXMLEventWriter
extends Object
implements XMLEventWriter
    Wrapper for an underlying XMLEventWriter that automatically adds indentation to the event stream.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected XMLEventFactory factory
      The configured event factory for this instance.

    • Constructor Detail

      • IndentXMLEventWriter

        public IndentXMLEventWriter(XMLEventWriter writer,
                    XMLEventFactory factory,
                    int indent)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        writer - underlying writer
        factory - event factory
        indent - indent amount, or negative to not add any whitespace
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if writer or factory is null

      • IndentXMLEventWriter

        public IndentXMLEventWriter(XMLEventWriter writer,
                    int indent)
        Convenience constructor. Equivalent to:
        IndentXMLEventWriter(writer, XMLEventFactory.newFactory(), indent)
        Parameters:
        writer - underlying writer
        indent - indent amount, or negative to not add any whitespace
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if writer or factory is null
